p: MDA was measured to evaluate the ability of CS-LO to radicals. As shown in Figure 4(b), there was a higher level of MDA in paw tissue at 5 h after Carr injection (p < 0.01). However, dose-related inhibition of the MDA level was observed in paw tissue at 5 h after treatment with CS-LO (50, 100, and 200 mg/kg); CS-LO at 100 and 200 mg/kg significantly decreased the MDA level in the paw tissue (p < 0.01), the same with Indo (10 mg/kg) ( Figure 4(b)).
